name: Veggy World
summary: Veggy World, an action game in which you control a strawberry-shaped spaceship that flies through broccoli-covered landscapes and turnip tree houses. Fire lasers and blue pellets at a steady wave of fruit and vegetable creatures, causing the personified food to explode in a bright burst. The depiction is mostly whimsical, though you do see their "kill percentage" tallied on menu screens at the end of each round. Game customized for each target platform.
